forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 26, with temperatures falling to around 23 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow after 10pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 12, with temperatures rising to around 15 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -2. Southwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy, with a high near 31. West southwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 21. West wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 26. Southwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 23, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. Southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 33. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 24. West wind 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

Nubs Nob.conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled with a track set yesterday. We plan to pack them today.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM
nubsNob.comments: The natural snow from the past few days has been tilled into the base and the snow surface is excellent. There is another inch of light snow on top of the corduroy this morning. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
